Package runtime.exceptions

package runtime.exceptions
Defines the checked Exceptions that may occur during execution. All of them are a concrete subclass of the ExecutionException. Exceptions are used (instead of simple error messages) to allow for uniform handling of errors during parsing and clearer control flow.
Author:
Alex Mandelias
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    ExecutionException
    Superclass of all checked exceptions that may occur during execution of machine code.
    InvalidInstructionException
    Thrown when an machine-code instruction was read but its operation code doesn't match any Instruction.
